name: Bootombaa
description: Snark kidnapped the beautiful princess.Knights trying to free a beautiful lady. Ferocious Snark kidnapped the beautiful princess. Brave knights trying to free a beautiful lady. Bootombaa defend your cave from attacks. You must help him!
